article_title: Calls to 'halt the country' through strike action grow.
sentence: Families  and  friends  of  the  hostages  have  been  holding  weekly  anti-government  demonstrations  since  251  people  were  taken  captive  on  7  October  after  Hamas  carried  out  a  deadly  attack  on  southern  Israel  that  killed  about  1,200  people.

article_title: Calls to 'halt the country' through strike action grow.
sentence: More  than  40,738  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
